overview: For some, submission is a unique way to get pleasure. What is more exciting than voluntarily obeying the desires of your partner? For his 40th anniversary, Marc Dorcel has decided to offer you some of the most arousing submission scenes filmed in the course of these past 40 years. 3h20, 11 scenes and 17 actresses, here’s the chance you were dreaming of to discover or rediscover the history of the inventor of French Pornochic.
title: 40th Anniversary : Submission
